description.en: Informs all party members of the location of the party leader.
description.ar: Informs all party members of the location of the party leader.
description.br: Informa a todos os membros do grupo sobre a localização do líder.
description.cns: 告诉团员们团长所在位置的技能。[消耗点数：0]
description.de: Eine Hand erscheint über dem Kopf der Spieler und zeigt in die Richtung, in welcher der Leiter der Party ist.
description.fi: Ilmoittaa ryhmän johtajalle ryhmän jäsenien sijainnit.
description.fil: Ituturo sa lahat ng mga miyembro ng partido ang lokasyon ng lider ng partido.
description.fr: Informe tous les membres de se regrouper près du leader.
description.id: Menginformasikan semua anggota party tentang lokasi party leader.
description.it: Informa tutti i membri del party sulla posizione del leader.
description.jp: メンバーたちにリーダーの位置を示すスキルです。
description.kr: 단원들에게 단장의 위치를 가르키는 스킬입니다. [포인트 소비 : 0]
description.nl: Informeerd alle partij leden van de locatie van de partij leider.
description.pl: Pokazuje pozycję Dowódcy drużyny jej członkom.
description.ru: Сообщает всем игрокам, где находится лидер труппы.
description.sp: Informa a todos los miembros de la party la localización del líder de la party.
description.sw: Informs all party members of the location of the party leader.
description.th: แจ้งสมาชิกปาร์ตี้ทุกคนถึงที่ตั้งของหัวหน้าปาร์ตี้
description.tw: 讓團員知道團長位置的技能
description.vi: Thông báo cho tất cả các thành viên trong nhóm biết vị trí của trưởng nhóm

description.en: Party leader orders party members to a attack a target.
description.ar: Party leader orders party members to a attack a target.
description.br: O líder do grupo ordena que os membros ataquem o alvo.
description.cns: 命令团员攻击指定目标的技能。[消耗点数：0]
description.de: Dieser Skill markiert ein Ziel, auf welches die Party ihren Angriff konzentrieren soll. Dieser Skill benötigt keine Partypunkte.
description.fi: Ryhmän johtaja määrää ryhmän jäsenet hyökkäämään kohdetta vastaan.
description.fil: Uutusan ng lider ng partido ang mga miyembro na atakihin ang napili niyang kalaban.
description.fr: Indique la cible sur laquelle concentrer l'attaque.
description.id: Party leader memerintahkan anggota party untuk menyerang target.
description.it: Il Leader ordina ai membri del party di attaccare l'obiettivo.
description.jp: リーダーが指定した対象に集中攻撃を行うよう知らせます。
description.kr: 단장이 지정한 대상에게 공격을 해달라고 알립니다. [포인트 소비 : 0]
description.nl: Partij leider beveelt de partij leden om een doel aan te vallen.
description.pl: Dowódca oznacza i wskazuje cel ataku.
description.sp: El líder ordena a los miembros de la party atacar a un objetivo.
description.sw: Party leader orders party members to a attack a target.
description.th: หัวหน้าปาร์ตี้สั่งให้สมาชิกปาร์ตี้โจมตีเป้าหมาย
description.tw: 團長下命令請團員攻擊指定對象
description.vi: Trưởng nhóm ra lệnh cho các thành viên tấn công một mục tiêu.

description.en: Party leader orders all party members to retreat.
description.ar: Party leader orders all party members to retreat.
description.br: O líder do grupo ordena que todos os membros se retirem.
description.cns: 通知团员撤退。[消耗点数：0]
description.de: Fordert die Mitglieder zum Rückzug auf.
description.fi: Ryhmän johtaja määrää ryhmän jäsenet perääntymään.
description.fil: Uutusan ng lider ng partido ang lahat ng mga miyembro ng partido na umatras sa kalaban.
description.fr: Commande aux membres de battre en retraite.
description.id: Party leader memerintahkan semua anggota party untuk mundur.
description.it: Il Leader ordina ai membri del party di ritirarsi.
description.jp: 団員たちに後退するよう知らせます。[ポイント消費：0]
description.nl: Partij leider beveelt alle partij leden om terug te vallen.
description.sp: El líder ordena a todos los miembros de la party retirarse.
description.sw: Party leader orders all party members to retreat.
description.th: หัวหน้าปาร์ตี้สั่งให้สมาชิกปาร์ตี้ทุกคนถอย
description.vi: Trưởng nhóm ra lệnh cho tất cả các thành viên rút lui.

name.th: ความแม่นยำ

description.en: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.ar: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.br: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.cns: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.de: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.fi: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.fil: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.fr: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.id: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.it: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.jp: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.kr: 리더 주변 극단원 전체의 다음 공격 시 치명타 확률이 극단원 수 × 0.5%만큼 증가합니다.
description.nl: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.pl: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.ru: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.sp: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.sw: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.th: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.tw: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
description.vi: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.

name.th: เชื่อมโยงการโจมตี

description.en: Each party member around the leader adds a 5% bonus to party leader damage.
description.ar: Each party member around the leader adds a 5% bonus to party leader damage.
description.br: Cada membro do grupo ao redor do líder adiciona um bônus de 5% ao dano do líder do grupo.
description.cns: 每位周围的剧团成员，会为团长提供5%的伤害加成。[消耗点数：3]
description.de: Erhöht die Angriffskraft des Partyleiters und hängt von der Anzahl der Partymitglieder in der Nähe ab.
description.fi: Each party member around the leader adds a 5% bonus to party leader damage.
description.fil: Ang bawat miyembro ng partido sa paligid ng lider ay magdadagdag ng 5% bonus sa pinsala ng lider ng partido.
description.fr: Augmente les dégâts du leader de 5% pour chaque joueur du groupe autour de lui.
description.id: Setiap anggota party di sekitar leader menambahkan bonus 5% untuk party leader damage.
description.it: Ogni membro del party vicino al leader riceve un bonus del 5% al ​​danno.
description.jp: 周囲のパーティーメンバーに応じて、パーティーリーダーのダメージが5%ずつ増加します。
description.kr: 단장이 타겟을 공격할 때 단장과 타겟이 같은 단원수에 의해 데미지가 5% 추가 됩니다. [포인트 소비 : 1]
description.nl: Elk partij lid in de buurt van de partij leider voegt 5% bonus aanval toe aan de schade van de partij leider.
description.pl: Każdy członek w zasięgu lidera dodaje mu bonus 5% do zadawanych obrażeń.
description.ru: Урон лидера труппы повышается на 5% за каждого из игроков вокруг него.
description.sp: Cada miembro de la party cercano al líder añade un 5% de bonus al daño del líder de la party.
description.sw: Each party member around the leader adds a 5% bonus to party leader damage.
description.th: สมาชิกปาร์ตี้แต่ละคนที่อยู่รอบๆหัวหน้า จะเพิ่มโบนัส 5%ให้กับdamageของหัวหน้าปาร์ตี้
description.tw: 依據周圍團員的人數，每一位增加團長攻擊傷害5%
description.vi: Mỗi thành viên trong nhóm xung quanh trưởng nhóm được cộng thêm 5% tiền thưởng cho sát thương của trưởng nhóm

description.en: Each party member receives a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member around them. Does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
description.ar: Each party member receives a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member around them. Does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
description.br: Cada membro do grupo recebe 2,5% de bônus de dano para cara membro próximo. Não irá funcionar para o Líder do grupo caso Elo Ofensivo estiver ativo.
description.cns: 周围每增加1位剧团成员，会为全体成员提供2.5%的伤害加成。如果同时使用了合作技能，则对剧团长无效。
description.de: Jedes Partymitglied erhält einen 2,5% Schadensbonus für jedes Partymitglied in seiner Nähe. Falls der Partyleiter zusätzlich #iLink Attack#ni nutzt, wirkt dieser Partyskill nicht für den Partyleiter.
description.fi: Each party member receives a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member around them. Does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
description.fil: Bawat party member ay makakakuha ng 2.5% na dagdag sa damage sa bawat miyembro ng party malapit sa kanila. Di makukuha ng leader ito kung aktibo ang Linked Attack.
description.fr: Chaque membre du groupe reçoit 2.5% de dégâts supplémentaires par membre du groupe à proximité. Ne s'applique pas au leader si Fureur est actif.
description.id: Setiap anggota party menerima damage bonus 2,5% untuk setiap anggota party di sekitar mereka. Tidak berlaku untuk leader jika Linked Attack aktif.
description.it: Ogni membro del party riceve un bonus di danno del 2.5% per ogni membro del party che gli è vicino. Non si applica al leader se Attacco Collegato è attivo.
description.jp: 周辺のパーティーメンバー1人につき、全員の攻撃力が2.5%アップします。リンクアタックが有効な場合、パーティーリーダーには適用されません。
description.kr: 각 단원들은 주위의 단원 수만큼 2.5%의 추가 데미지 증가 보너스를 받습니다. 링크 어택이 활성화 되어 있으면 단장에게는 적용되지 않습니다.
description.nl: Each party member receives a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member around them. Does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
description.pl: Każdy członek drużyny otrzymuje 2.5% dodatkowych obrażeń za każdego gracza w zasięgu. Nie dotyczy to lidera jeśli Łączony Atak jest aktywny.
description.ru: Все в труппе получают 2.5% бонуса к атаке за каждого участника поблизости. Не действует на лидера при использовании Зерга.
description.sp: Los miembros de la party reciben un 2.5% de bonus al daño por cada miembro cercano a ellos. Este efecto no se aplica al líder si Ataque Vinculado está activo.
description.sw: Each party member receives a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member around them. Does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
description.th: สมาชิกปาร์ตี้แต่ละคนจะได้รับdamageโบนัส 2.5% สำหรับสมาชิกปาร์ตี้ทุกคนที่อยู่รอบตัวพวกเขา ใช้ไม่ได้กับหัวหน้าหาก Linked Attack ทำงานอยู่
description.tw: 周圍每增加一位團員，全員的攻擊力就增加2.5%。如果在有聲援團長的效果下，則團長不會有此技能的效果
description.vi: Mỗi thành viên trong nhóm nhận được 2,5% tiền thưởng sát thương cho mỗi thành viên xung quanh họ. Không áp dụng cho trưởng nhóm nếu đang sử dụng Phối hợp tấn công

name.jp: フォーチュンドロップ
name.vi: Vật phẩm may mắn rơi ra

description.en: Increases the chance of Masquerpets dropping unique items.
description.ar: Increases the chance of Masquerpets dropping unique items.
description.br: Aumenta a chance dos Masquerpets deixarem cair itens únicos.
description.cns: 增加怪物身上掉落特殊装备的概率。 [消耗点数：5]
description.de: Ab Partylevel 25 verfügbar. Erhöht die Chance, dass ein Monster einen seltenen Gegenstand fallen lässt.
description.fi: Kasvattaa mahdollsuuksia uniikkien esineiden putoamiselle Masquerpetseiltä.
description.fil: Tataas ang tyansa ng lahat ng miyembro ng partido na makakuha ng unique items sa mga Masquerpets.
description.fr: Augmente la probabilité de trouver des objets rares sur les monstres, les chances pouvant au mieux être doublées.
description.id: Meningkatkan kemungkinan Masquerpet menjatuhkan unique item.
description.it: Aumenta la possibilità di far droppare ai mostri oggetti rari.
description.jp: モンスターから出るアイテムのドロップ率が増加します。[ポイント消費：5]
description.kr: 몬스터에게서 나오는 유니크 아이템의 발생확률이 증가합니다. [포인트 소비 : 5]
description.nl: Verhoogt de kans dat monsters uniekere items droppen.
description.pl: Zwiększa szansę na otrzymanie rzadkich przedmiotów z Potworów.
description.sp: Incrementa la probabilidad de que los Masquerpets suelten objetos únicos.
description.sw: Increases the chance of Masquerpets dropping unique items.
description.th: เพิ่มโอกาสที่ Masquerpets จะดรอปไอเทมunique
description.tw: 增加怪物掉落物品的機率
description.vi: Tăng cơ hội khi đánh quái Masquerpets rơi ra các vật phẩm độc đáo.

description.en: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist party members recover 1.8 times faster.
description.ar: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist party members recover 1.8 times faster.
description.br: Os membros se recuperam 1,5 vezes mais rápido. Se o líder do grupo é um Assist, os membros do grupo se recuperam 1,8 vezes mais rápido.
description.cns: 不在战斗状态的团员在团长周围坐下休息则恢复速度是平时的1.5倍。如果团长的职业是圣职者，恢复速度是平时的1.8倍.[消耗点数：2]
description.de: Erhöht die Wiederherstellungsrate der HP der Partymitglieder um das 1,5-fache. Wenn der Partyleiter Assist ist, erhöht sie sich um das 1,8-fache.
description.fi: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist party members recover 1.8 times faster.
description.fil: Bibilis ang pag-galing ng mga miyembro ng partido ng 1.5 beses. Kung ang lider ng partido ay isang Assist, tataas ito sa 1.8 beses.
description.fr: Commande aux membres hors combat de se reposer, augmentant la vitesse de récupération de 50%, ou de 80% si le leader est un Acolyte.
description.id: Anggota party pulih 1,5 kali lebih cepat. Jika party leader adalah anggota Assist party pulih 1,8 kali lebih cepat.
description.it: I membri del party recuperano 1.5 volte più velocemente. Se il leader del party è un Assist, i membri del party recuperano 1.8 volte più velocemente.
description.jp: パーティーメンバーの回復の量が1.5倍になります。パーティーリーダーがアシストなら1.8倍に増加します。
description.kr: 전투 중이 아닌 단원들은 평소보다 1.5배 더 빠르게 회복합니다. 단장의 직업이 어시스트면 1.8배로 증가합니다. [포인트 소비 : 2]
description.nl: Partij leden herstellen 1.5 keer sneller. Als de partij leider een Assist is, dan herstellen de leden 1.8 keer sneller.
description.pl: Członkowie drużyny regenerują się 50% szybciej. Jeśli Dowódca jest Asystentem to regenerują się 80% szybciej.
description.ru: Игроки труппы восстанавливают здоровье, энергию и ману в 1.5 раза быстрее. А если лидер - Униформист, то в 1.8 раз быстрее.
description.sp: Los miembros de la party se recuperan 1.5 veces más rápido. Si el líder de la party es un Assist, los miembros de la party se recuperan 1.8 veces más rápido.
description.sw: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist party members recover 1.8 times faster.
description.th: สมาชิกปาร์ตี้ฟื้นตัวเร็วขึ้น 1.5 เท่า หากหัวหน้าปาร์ตี้เป็น Assist สมาชิกในปาร์ตี้จะฟื้นตัวเร็วขึ้น 1.8 เท่า
description.tw: 讓隊伍成員的恢復量變成1.5倍。若團長的職業是神職者則恢復量變成1.8倍
description.vi: Thành viên nhóm phục hồi nhanh hơn 1,5 lần. Nếu trưởng nhóm là một Assit, thành viên trong nhóm sẽ phục hồi nhanh hơn 1,8 lần.

description.en: Increases the amount of items dropped by Masquerpets.
description.ar: Increases the amount of items dropped by Masquerpets.
description.br: Aumenta a quantidade de itens que caem dos Masquerpets.
description.cns: 从怪物身上掉落物品增加2倍。[消耗点数：8]
description.de: Ab Partylevel 40 verfügbar. Erhöht die Droprate. Jeder Gegenstand hat unterschiedlich hohe Dropchancen. Entweder eine doppelte Drop- oder eine normale Drop-Chance für die Dauer des Skills.
description.fi: Kasvattaa mahdollisuuksia useamman esineen putoamiseen Masquerpetseiltä.
description.fil: Dadami ang makukuhang items sa mga Masquerpets.
description.fr: Augmente le nombre d'objets laissés tombés par les monstres, le butin pouvant au mieux être doublé.
description.id: Meningkatkan jumlah item yang dijatuhkan oleh Masquerpets.
description.it: Aumenta il numero di drop lasciati dai mostri.
description.jp: モンスターからドロップするアイテムの抽選が2回になる。[ポイント消費：8]
description.kr: 몬스터에게서 떨어지는 아이템의 양이 두배가 된다. [포인트 소비 : 8]
description.nl: Verhoogt het aantal items dat gedropt wordt door monsters.
description.pl: Zwiększa ilość przedmiotów upuszczanych przez Potwory.
description.ru: Повышает количество предметов, падающих с монстров.
description.sp: Incrementa la cantidad de items soltados por Masquerpets.
description.sw: Increases the amount of items dropped by Masquerpets.
description.th: เพิ่มจำนวนไอเทมที่ดรอปจาก Masquerpets
description.tw: 讓怪物掉落的物品增加
description.vi: Tăng số lượng vật phẩm rơi ra khi đánh quái Masquerpets.
